metadata.title: CVE-2024-12085 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
[Info Leak via uninitialized Stack contents defeats ASLR]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-12085` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

rsync - 3.1.1-3ubuntu1.3+esm3
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: rsync package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.1-3ubuntu1.3+esm3').
